items.name: Symphony No. 2 'Resurrection'
items.description: Manuscript of Gustav Mahler's Symphony No. 2 'Resurrection'

items.name: Manuscript of Bach's Das Wohltemperierte Klavier, Book 1, BWV 846.a-869.a
items.description: The only surving record of Bach's Das Wohltemperierte Klavier, Book 1, BWV 846.a-869.a

users.name: Thomas Macaluso
users.Description: This is an interesting manuscript by Beethoven. It is a sketchbook that contains many of his ideas and compositions. It is a valuable resource for musicologists and musicians alike.

users.name: Caspar George
users.Description: This is a fascinating manuscript of Mahler's Symphony No. 2 'Resurrection'. It provides insight into Mahler's compositional process and the development of this monumental work.
